text:
Hey <!here|@here>, remember when I said that HubDB APIs could change anytime? Well, that time has come. I'm making a change to how you access columns. Instead of using `row.get(<columnId>)` or `row.col('<columnName>')` you'll access them as any other HubL dict. 

`row.<columnName>` or `row['<columnName>']` or `row[<columnId>]`

This will mean changing your pages, but I think the new API is more consistent and cleaner. The change isn't live now, but should be out by Monday.
